name: RGB & Me
description:
Guess the RGB - Gets harder the better you do.

Click the WHITE (255,255,255) Square Box to begin!

You will lose points for incorrect guesses.

How many can you get correct before the timer bar runs out!?

Scores have been reset and a few tweaks to account for random clicking! :D thanks Luka :D

More Credits for Luka

Now you will lose more time for incorrect guesses.

Every step of the game is randomized meaning no two plays will ever play the same.

The Additional Colour Boxes appear earlier on.

Thank you for finding these holes Luka :)
